prompt: FLOWROLL outputs become extremely jagged after I import weekly data. Why would weekly imports create jagged windows?
completion: A 4-week window is too small to smooth typical weekly fluctuations.

prompt: DIMMATCH aligns correctly for Q1 but shows blanks in Q2. Why only Q2 breaks?
completion: Add mappings for those SKUs to restore alignment.

prompt: FLOWROLL seems to ignore the first period every time. Why is the first period excluded?
completion: PeriodCount must be at least 2 to form meaningful windows; with 1, it's effectively just the input value.

prompt: DIMMATCH duplicates a single customer record into all channels. Why is it spreading across channels?
completion: Then channel expansion is expected.

prompt: FLOWROLL behaves differently after I switched the model to a 4-4-5 calendar. Is FLOWROLL calendar-dependent?
completion: That reset can create gaps or reorder periods unintentionally.

prompt: DIMMATCH collapses values when I align a multi-parent SKU structure. Why collapse?
completion: Specify a single mapping path to avoid collapse.

prompt: FLOWROLL goes flat in the middle of the year even though the data isn’t flat. What causes mid-year flat spots?
completion: Then the rolling window will naturally flatten.

prompt: DIMMATCH aligns SKUs fine but misaligns sub-brands. Why only sub-brands fail?
completion: Rebuilt lists require updated mappings.

prompt: FLOWROLL returns incorrect values after I manually renamed periods. Does renaming affect calculations?
completion: Those labels can sort unpredictably, breaking window order.

prompt: DIMMATCH applies a single value across multiple countries. Why replicate across countries?
completion: That's why it's being replicated.

prompt: FLOWROLL spikes only on specific store locations. Why would certain locations spike but others don’t?
completion: That correction creates spikes in windows containing it.

prompt: DIMMATCH works for historical data but not for forecast months. Why do forecasts fail?
completion: Cloned lists require separate mapping definitions.

prompt: FLOWROLL does nothing when PeriodCount is 0. Should 0 be allowed?
completion: Increase it to a positive value to generate windows.

prompt: DIMMATCH misaligns when I filter out inactive members. Why do filters matter?
completion: Those excluded items are needed for alignment.

prompt: FLOWROLL results double when I concatenate Actuals and Forecast into a single series. Why double?
completion: This creates duplicate period structures inside the window.

prompt: DIMMATCH expands some values even though the mapping is one-to-one. Why expansion with 1:1 mapping?
completion: That extra granularity causes expansion.

prompt: FLOWROLL outputs stale values unless I run a full model recalculation. Why stale windows?
completion: Ensure dependencies are updated.

prompt: DIMMATCH aligns correctly for everything except returns. Why returns fail?
completion: Numbered lists require explicit mapping codes.

prompt: FLOWROLL behaves unpredictably when periods overlap between years. Why overlap matters?
completion: Duplicate names cause sorting collisions.

prompt: DIMMATCH outputs blanks only when the Source has summary-level formulas. Why?
completion: Align leaf-level items instead.

prompt: FLOWROLL suddenly drops after I inserted a manual override. Why would an override impact all windows?
completion: That low value propagates downward.

prompt: DIMMATCH correctly aligns the hierarchy but produces warnings for 'ambiguous path'. Why ambiguous?
completion: That creates ambiguous mapping paths.

prompt: FLOWROLL gives blank results when the underlying module uses daily periods. Does it support daily?
completion: Missing days break rolling continuity unless explicitly allowed.

prompt: DIMMATCH stops working entirely after a list import. What could break all alignment?
completion: Now all mappings must be regenerated.

prompt: FLOWROLL looks delayed by multiple periods. Why so much delay?
completion: A 24-period window creates heavy lag.

prompt: DIMMATCH shows misaligned results after I added an alternate hierarchy for reporting. Why affect alignment?
completion: Update mapping to reflect the new primary path.

prompt: FLOWROLL turns into blanks when I sort the module by a text column. Why sorting by text breaks rolling?
completion: FLOWROLL requires chronological ordering.

prompt: DIMMATCH silently compresses all results when I align a scenario that uses a summary node as Source. Why compression?
completion: Leaf-level mapping is required for granular alignment.

prompt: FLOWROLL shows 'missing values' even though everything looks numeric. Why false missing values?
completion: Those spaces can invalidate rolling windows.

prompt: DIMMATCH loses some members during a time-based alignment. Why would time affect structural alignment?
completion: Those filters hide items needed for complete alignment.

prompt: FLOWROLL displays opposite trends when I reverse the direction from BACKWARD to FORWARD. Why opposite?
completion: Yes—direction changes the interpretation entirely.

prompt: DIMMATCH emits 'structure mismatch' errors when aligning a list subset with a full list. Why mismatch?
completion: Inactive products may still be required for full hierarchy alignment.

prompt: FLOWROLL stops producing values at the end of the year when the scenario ends early. Why end-of-scenario blanks?
completion: December windows require a missing period, hence blanks.

prompt: DIMMATCH aligns but changes total values across each region. Why do regional totals differ?
completion: Store granularity drives the differing totals.

prompt: FLOWROLL behaves oddly when I merge historical and future time ranges. Why merging ranges cause issues?
completion: That entirely breaks rolling windows.

prompt: DIMMATCH throws 'unmapped parent' warnings. How can a parent be unmapped?
completion: Add parent-level mappings to resolve it.
